about_the_game:
Judofuri is a local party game from 2 to 9 players, where you face off in a variety of easy-to-pickup, fast-paced mini-games. Bring your friends and family and embrace the chaos!

ONE BUTTON ONLY

Each player needs one, and ONLY one button to compete in Judofuri. And you get to choose yours at the beginning of each session! A mouse click, a gamepad trigger, a spacebar, anything works.

20+ MINI-GAMES

Race through hurdles, chop vegetables, train your cardio, fish, and more! Each mini-game is unique and requires a different skill, so everyone gets their opportunity to shine.

SHARE THE CONTROLLER

Tired of always being one gamepad short for your couch gaming sessions? Share the same device with 2, 3, even 9 players!

name: Judofuri Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+ (64bits)
  • Processor: Intel i5-3317U / AMD Ryzen 3 3200 U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: You only need one button to compete in this fruity party game! Press it, squeeze it & mash it in a series of silly mini-games for 2 to 9 players and claim your spot as the juiciest fruit of ‘em all!
